name: Winter Magic
description:
~About~

Emily has just moved to a witch town in hopes she'll befriend the local witches and learn magic. After a couple days, she finally gathers the courage to introduce herself to her neighbor, Linnea. She invites Emily to go on an adventure around the small mountain they live on and Emily accepts~

This is a game I made for Yuri Game Jam 2020! It only takes about 20 minutes to play and it only has one ending. I also intend to make a sequel to this some day!

~Credits~

Music, art and story - Kyanite Heart
Some sound effects are from freesound.org
A big thanks to my friends who helped me test it!

Let me know what you think of the game in the comments or in the ratings. It really means a lot! You can also purchase the soundtracks and/or the art collection if you want to!
